name: Arushi Singh
profile: Meticulous web developer with 3+ years of front-end experience and a passion for responsive website design. Implemented a new responsive and user-friendly web application for the general scrapping of oils and wells websites, making it easy for data analysts to collect and analyze the data.
skills: AWS (Lambda, Cognito, EC2, ECS, MQTT, DynamoDB)
Autodesk Forge Viewer / Autodesk Platform Services

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Built a BIM visualization application using Forge Viewer with user-driven interaction and controls.
Implemented Redux for seamless, centralized state management across the app.
Integrated OBJ assets into Forge Viewer to improve load performance and capabilities.

experience.title: Team Lead
experience.company: Centre for Computational Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (CCTech)
bullets: Created a dashboard with 10+ applications; handled customer meetings and presented frontend updates.
Developed core logic and problem-solving solutions for new feature implementation.
Built reusable code and libraries to accelerate future development.
Worked on Flair 3D project, visualizing 3D sensors on the frontend.

experience.title: Member of Technical Staff
experience.company: Centre for Computational Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (CCTech)
bullets: Implemented web apps and landing pages end-to-end with ReactJS, Python, and AWS.
Standardized UI with a responsive, user-friendly approach; validated all user inputs before submission.
Collaborated with designers to translate visuals into functional pages; assessed UX and UI feasibility.
achievements: Reduced bugs by 40% by eliminating prop drilling

projects.name: BIM Structure Viewer
projects.summary: A performant BIM viewer replacing legacy pipelines, with camera controls, sectioning, and material toggles.

projects.name: Flair 3D — Sensor Visualization
projects.summary: Visualizes 3D sensors and live states in a responsive WebGL interface for engineering teams.

projects.name: Satellite Orbit Visualizer
projects.summary: CesiumJS app to simulate satellite orbit, orientation and field of view with interactive controls.

projects.name: OBJ/GLTF Pipeline (Backend-driven)
projects.summary: Shifted column/beam generation to backend and streamed OBJ/GLTF to the client; cached parts in IndexedDB.

projects.name: Dimensioned Geometry Tool
projects.summary: Three.js utility to add dimension lines with arrows/labels around meshes; interactive resizing and offsets.
